response.overview: Solène, a hairdressing apprentice, decides to change her hairstyle. Is she right to put herself in the hands of her rather casual classmates? Isn't she heading for disaster? Fortunately, the teacher, though good-natured, keeps an eye on things. Against a backdrop of chatter, laughter, and song, we share Solène's fears, and then we witness her metamorphosis.
response.title: Solène change de tête
